snippet.title: DOS Game: Alpha Storm
snippet.description:
Alpha Storm intro and gameplay, played and recorded with DOSBox.


The game runs fine in DOSBox-0.74 but the intro movie shows up as a black screen and only the sounds can be heard. You can use the following link to download a patch that fixes the intro in DOSBox:
http://www.mediafire.com/?qbf8iybpyn1qt1d

The patch can also be used to fix a bug in one of the maps.
